description: React component implementing an 'Edit Note' page allowing users to modify existing notes. It loads the note by ID from URL parameters, displays a form for editing, and handles submission and navigation.

methods.name: EditNotePage
methods.description: Main React component for editing a note. Manages loading state, fetches note data by ID, and renders a form for editing.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Internal async function that fetches note data based on ID and updates component state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission by updating the note and navigating to its detail page.
